document_data.name: Ventdiver
document_data.mainbody: '''Ventdivers''' were a variety of [[fish]] found in the [[Sea of Moving Ice]], named for their uncanny ability to survive in both normal waters and the noxious waters near thermal vents.

Ability.Biology: These creatures had high concentrations of rock oil within their swim bladders. Some speculated that it was somehow related to their uncanny ability to survive around thermal vents.

Ecology.Diet: Ventdivers were a predatory, carnivorous species.
Ecology.Habitats: Around the Sea of Moving Ice, ventdivers were found in deep waters, in its trenches, around its thermal vents, and around [[Icecrag island]].
